programme.desc: New York plays Kansas City at Kauffman Stadium. Veteran Royals starter Seth Lugo opposes Yankees rookie Will Warren. Lugo has held Yankees superstar Aaron Judge in check across his career, with the two-time AL MVP going 1-for-14 with five strikeouts.

programme.title: New York Yankees Postgame
programme.desc: Recap and highlights of the Yankees game.
